glsa.title: SILC Server: Denial of Service
glsa.synopsis: SILC Server is affected by a Denial of Service vulnerability.

background.p: SILC Server is a server for the Secure Internet Live Conferencing (SILC) protocol.

description.p: Frank Benkstein discovered a possible NULL pointer dereference in apps/silcd/command.c if a new channel is created without specifying a valid hmac or cipher algorithm name.

impact.p: A remote attacker could cause the server to crash, resulting in a Denial of Service.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All SILC Server users should upgrade to the latest version:
